text: Afrothismia winkleri is a species of plant in the Burmanniaceae family. It is found in Cameroon, Nigeria, and possibly Uganda. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==Sources== * Category:Burmanniaceae Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Afrothismia winkleri
